body.name: 1080p Video Doorbell Camera Wireless with Ring Chime, AI Human Detection, 2-Way Audio, FHD Live View, Wire-Free, Night Vision, Cloud Storage, Battery Powered, Indoor Outdoor Surveillance

features: Complimentary Doorbell Chime: Every package comes with a versatile doorbell chime. Position it anywhere in your home – whether it's the living room, kitchen, or veranda – to promptly get notified. Multiply your convenience by linking multiple chimes to one doorbell.
Smart Human Detection: Thanks to AI-driven technology, our system precisely detects human activity, disregarding inconsequential motions like moving cars or fluttering foliage.
Superior Night Vision: With four infrared lights paired with a smart sensor, our camera promises exceptional video quality, even in dim lighting, ensuring round-the-clock safety.

Secure Cloud Storage: Our AES-128 encrypted cloud storage offers an enhanced experience through an optional subscription (available separately). Enjoy a complimentary 30-day trial for uninterrupted recording and sharing.
Interactive 2-Way Communication: Engage in real-time dialogues with visitors, no matter where you are.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bitepass 1080p Wireless Video Doorbell Camera with Chime Included

1080p Viewing Our doorbell camera offers 1080p image quality coupled with infrared night vision capabilities, ensuring you can monitor your home day and night. Smart Human Detection Thanks to AI-driven technology, our system detects human activity, disregarding inconsequential motions like moving cars or fluttering foliage. Two-Way Audio Engage in real-time dialogues with visitors, no matter where you are. Superior Night Vision With infrared lights paired with a smart sensor, our camera promises exceptional video quality, even in dim lighting, ensuring round-the-clock safety.

Secure Cloud Storage Our AES-128 encrypted cloud storage offers an enhanced experience through an optional subscription (available separately). Complimentary Doorbell Chime The package includes a chime that you can place in any area of your home - be it the dining room, kitchen, or patio - for immediate notifications. Optimized 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Support Our camera is meticulously designed for 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connectivity (5GHz Wi-Fi not supported). All-Weather IP65 Design Featuring a robust IP65 rating, this doorbell is resilient to dust and moisture, performing consistently across diverse climatic conditions.

Can the doorbell camera handle connections to 5GHz Wi-Fi networks? This doorbell camera connects to 2.4GHz Wi-Fi only. Ensure you have two Wi-Fi networks, one for 2.4GHz and another for 5GHz, with different names for proper connection. Should I buy an SD card for this video doorbell? SD cards aren't needed for this doorbell camera. It saves to the cloud, and you can start with a free trial. Does the package contain an indoor chime? Yes, it offers a chime designed for indoors. Does the doorbell camera support viewing from a mobile phone remotely? Of course, the video is accessible for viewing via the Aiwit app. Is there any security measure like encryption for videos on the cloud? Certainly, your footage is under AES-128 encryption in our cloud storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy! Great product!
reviews.reviewText: Fast delivery, super easy to set up.Very reasonable price.Cloud save all vids is great. Nice sleek design.Doorbell sound not overbearing, very subtle, perfect volume. Visuals look high def!I’m going to buy a 2nd one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am so pleasantly surprised by this video doorbell. Extremely affordable, super easy setup and crystal clear product. I am so pleased with this product I will likely purchase others for my summer cabin. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love my camera! It works well and the quality is clear. The app is super easy to use. It makes me feel safe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As good as it gets!
reviews.reviewText: This camera was so easy to install, the app is great and only cost $28 for six months. Your initial investment will be this cost in addition to the cost of the camera. The camera Connected to WiFi easily and the battery life is really top notch. Straight out the box it had 70% I did not charge it because I wanted to see how long it would last and surprisingly I just recharged it for the first time after ONE MONTH!The view is great, 9/10 non pixelated wide angle and captures videos and audio well in HD

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money!
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t know that I would have to pay to be able to see the recordings. Also, it keeps sending me notifications every 5 minutes saying that it detected someone when there is nobody there. Please don’t waste your money on this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for a great price!
reviews.reviewText: The camera quality is great during the day at night! Very easy to use and set up. I have recommended this item to a few of my friends because I am very satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Sensing nothing all day and night!
reviews.reviewText: The install simplicity we loved. However, our phones' battery depletion is terrible with the camera activating and alerting when no motion is detected. Please advise how to address this or if we have a defective unit?!
